meanings.definition: Proven to be genuine or true
meanings.sent1: The signature on the document was authenticated by the expert.
meanings.sent2: The certificate came with an authenticated stamp to show its validity.
meanings.sent3: The detective authenticated the suspect's alibi with solid evidence.
meanings.sent4: Her smile authenticated her happiness more than any words could.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact's age was authenticated by carbon dating.

meanings.sent1: The website required an authenticated login to access sensitive information.
meanings.sent2: The authenticated ticket allowed entry into the exclusive event.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to have an authenticated rabbit inside!
meanings.sent4: His actions authenticated his loyalty to the team.
meanings.sent5: The official stamp authenticated the document as genuine.
